description: Implement Tree as compound component (~300 lines) following Accordion patterns. Includes: Tree root, Tree.Item (expandable node with disclosure), Tree.ItemContent (label + actions), Tree.Group (nested children). Uses Object.assign pattern, frozen B constant with CSS variable slots, TreeContext for expansion state, useTooltip integration, keyboard navigation (arrow keys), selection modes (single/multiple), lazy loading support, and data-* attributes (data-expanded, data-selected, data-level). Reference: accordion.tsx for expand/collapse pattern, RAC Tree docs.
title: Tree component
